title: Need help with RP
body:
Hey riot....I have 2691 rp, which is almost enough to get two 1350 skins. However, as you can see, im 9 rp off....
is there anyway you guys can help me out here?

replies.body:
We may be able to lend a hand, but when it relates to RP, these requests need to come to us through a Player Support request. If you haven't done so already, send your request [**HERE**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). 

:)

Off topic, Do any other Riot'ers utilize a single letter for their name too!? like Like "Riot R". haha 

Or are you the one and only?

Be honest with yourself. You are not gonna stop buying RP after you get those 2 skins. So buy one and wait off the next :/ UNLESS you are a real cheap kind who is trying to shave off 8 RP. Hey, i can respect that. I myself am one of those idiots who spends all their money ( and some of my friends money too :D ) so 8 RP is just a drop in the bucket XD
